Operation 'getMerchandisedProducts' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary entirely. Description contains useful information but lacks clarity on required inputs (category ID, metric parameter), expected output structure (BestSellingProductResponse or MerchandisedProduct array), and authentication requirements. Added concise summary, clarified input parameters, specified return type context, and consolidated sandbox restrictions for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description:
This method returns an array of products based on the category and metric specified. This includes details of the product, such as the eBay product ID (EPID), title, and user reviews and ratings for the product. You can use the epid returned by this method in the Browse API search method to retrieve items for this product.

Restrictions

  • To test getMerchandisedProducts in Sandbox, you must use category ID 9355 and the response will be mock data.
  • For a list of supported sites and other restrictions, see API Restrictions.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve merchandised products by category and metric
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves an array of merchandised products filtered by category ID and metric (such as Best Selling, Also Bought, or Also Viewed). Returns product details including eBay Product ID (EPID), title, price, condition, ratings, and review information. The returned EPID can be used with the Browse API search method to retrieve specific items for the product. Requires OAuth2 authentication. Note: Sandbox testing requires category ID 9355 and returns mock data.
